sn35.148:1.3: katama ca sa, bhikkhave, nibbanasappaya patipada?
sn35.148:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, cakkhum dukkhanti passati, rupa dukkhati passati, cakkhuvinnanam dukkhanti passati, cakkhusamphasso dukkhoti passati, yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi dukkhanti passati …pe…
sn35.148:1.6: mano dukkhoti passati, dhamma dukkhati passati, manovinnanam dukkhanti passati, manosamphasso dukkhoti passati, yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi dukkhanti passati.
sn35.148:1.7: Ayam kho sa, bhikkhave, nibbanasappaya patipada”ti.
